@muk0690 :  Nokia 5800XM ACCEPTS x264/H264 video in MP4 container - but max. resolution is rather small, common cell-phone res. of just 320x240.

XviD could be 640x360 (as H264 for U97) but hardware limitations prevent H264  playback of higher resolutions. Sorry, but 320x240  is too small for anything decent.
